TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Financial extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于执行财务运算的过程。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform financial operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持执行财务计算，例如折旧、 现状和未来值、 利率、 返回时和支付的费率 Visual Basic 运行时库成员。This module supports the Visual Basic run-time library members that perform financial calculations such as depreciation, present and future values, interest rates, rates of return, and payments. ## Examples 此示例使用`Rate`函数来计算的贷款利率付款的总数目 (`TotPmts`)，贷款付款金额 (`Payment`)，现值或主体的贷款 (`PVal`)，未来贷款的值 (`FVal`)，指示是否付款截止时间是在开头或末尾付款期内的数字 (`PayType`)，并预期利率的近似值 (`Guess`)。This example uses the `Rate` function to calculate the interest rate of a loan, given the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of the loan payment (`Payment`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`), and an approximation of the expected interest rate (`Guess`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double DDB (double Cost, double Salvage, double Life, double Period, double Factor = 2);
.method public static float64 DDB(float64 Cost, float64 Salvage, float64 Life, float64 Period, float64 Factor) cil managed
Public Function DDB (Cost As Double, Salvage As Double, Life As Double, Period As Double, Optional Factor As Double = 2) As Double
static member DDB : double * double * double * double * double -> double

param.name: Cost
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定资产原始成本的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Salvage
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定资产在使用年限结束时的价值的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying value of the asset at the end of its useful life.

param.name: Life
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定资产使用年限的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying length of useful life of the asset.

param.name: Period
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定计算资产折旧时所用期间的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying period for which asset depreciation is calculated.

param.name: Factor
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定余额下降比率的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying rate at which the balance declines.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 2（双倍余额递减法）。

span.span: If omitted, 2 (double-declining method) is assumed.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它使用双倍余额递减法或指定的其他方法来指定特定时间段内的资产折旧。

span.span: Returns a specifying the depreciation of an asset for a specific time period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它使用双倍余额递减法或指定的其他方法来指定特定时间段内的资产折旧。

span.span: Returns a specifying the depreciation of an asset for a specific time period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双倍余额递减平衡方法计算更快地执行此步骤。The double-declining balance method computes depreciation at an accelerated rate. 执行此步骤是在第一个时间段内最高，后续周期中会降低。Depreciation is highest in the first period and decreases in successive periods. `Life`和`Period`参数必须以相同的单位。The `Life` and `Period` arguments must be expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Life`给定的几个月，`Period`还必须在几个月提供。For example, if `Life` is given in months, `Period` must also be given in months. 所有参数必须都是正数。All arguments must be positive numbers. `DDB`函数使用以下公式来计算的一段给定时间执行此步骤：The `DDB` function uses the following formula to calculate depreciation for a given period: 执行此步骤 / 时间段 = ((Cost – Salvage) \* 身份) / 生命Depreciation / Period = ((Cost – Salvage) \* Factor) / Life ## Examples 此示例使用`DDB`函数以返回给定的初始成本在指定期间内的资产折旧 (`InitCost`)，资产的有用生命周期的结束处的残值 (`SalvageVal`)、 总年 (中资产的生命周期`LifeTime`)，和的时间段以年为其计算执行此步骤 (`Depr`)。This example uses the `DDB` function to return the depreciation of an asset for a specified period given the initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`), and the period in years for which the depreciation is calculated (`Depr`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double FV (double Rate, double NPer, double Pmt, double PV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);

static member FV : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期利率的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的年利率 (APR) 为 10%，按月还款，则每期利率为 0.1/12（即 0.0083）。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金付款总期数的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的期限为四年，按月还款，则这笔贷款共有 4 \* 12（即 48）个支付周期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期应付金额的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying payment to be made each period.

param.span: 付款金额通常包含本金和利息，该值在年金的有效期限内都不会改变。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that doesn't change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定未来一系列付款金额（或一次付清款项）现值的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying present value (or lump sum) of a series of future payments.

param.span: 例如，如果您贷款买车，贷款额就是您将以按月还款的方式付给贷方的现值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 类型的对象指定付款何时到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 如果在付款期末付款，则此参数必须为 ；如果在付款期初付款，则此参数必须为 。

span.span: This argument must be either if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 。

span.span: If omitted, is assumed.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金的终值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the future value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金的终值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the future value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是随着时间的推移固定的现金付款的一系列。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over time. 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或投资 （如每月节省计划）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用相同单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`按月计算，`NPer`还必须通过使用几个月计算。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. （例如存款） 支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用`FV`函数以返回给定百分比投资的未来值速率累算每个期间的时间 (`APR / 12`)，付款的总数 (`TotPmts`)，付款 (`Payment`)，当前值投资 (`PVal`)，和一个数字，指示是否在开头或末尾付款期内的进行付款 (`PayType`)。This example uses the `FV` function to return the future value of an investment given the percentage rate that accrues per period (`APR / 12`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the payment (`Payment`), the current value of the investment (`PVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is made at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). 请注意，由于`Payment`表示现金吐钱，它为负数。Note that because `Payment` represents cash paid out, it is a negative number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#22)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double IPmt (double Rate, double Per, double NPer, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);

Public Function IPmt (Rate As Double, Per As Double, NPer As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member IPmt : double * double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.VisualBasic.Financial.IPmt (Rate, Per, NPer, PV, FV, Due)

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期利率的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的年利率 (APR) 为 10%，按月还款，则每期利率为 0.1/12（即 0.0083）。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Per
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 在从 1 到 NPer 范围内指定支付周期的 。

span.span: specifying payment period in the range 1 through NPer.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金付款总期数的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的期限为四年，按月还款，则这笔贷款共有 4 \* 12（即 48）个支付周期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定未来一系列支出或收入现值的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，如果您贷款买车，贷款额就是您将以按月还款的方式付给贷方的现值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 数据类型，指定完成最后一次付款后所希望的终值或现金余额。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you've made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，贷款的终值为 0，这是因为终值是末期还款之后的价值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that's its value after the final payment.

param.span: 但是，如果您想用 18 年的时间存储 $50,000 作为孩子的教育经费，则 $50,000 是终值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 类型的对象指定付款何时到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 如果在付款期末付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.EndOfPeriod；如果在付款期初付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.BegOfPeriod。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金在给定期间的支付利息。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金在给定期间的支付利息。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是随着时间的推移固定的现金付款的一系列。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over time. 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或投资 （如每月节省计划）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用相同单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`按月计算，`NPer`还必须通过使用几个月计算。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. （例如存款） 支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用`IPmt`函数以计算相等值的所有付款时的付款是感兴趣。This example uses the `IPmt` function to calculate how much of a payment is interest when all the payments are of equal value. 提供了每期利率百分比 (`APR / 12`)，为其所需的相关部分的支付周期 (`Period`)，付款的总数 (`TotPmts`)，现值或主体的贷款 (`PVal`)，则贷款的终值 (`FVal`)，以及一个用于指示是否付款的开头或末尾的支付周期截止时间是数字 (`PayType`)。Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment period for which the interest portion is desired (`Period`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double IRR (ref double[] ValueArray, double Guess = 0.1);
.method public static float64 IRR(float64[]& ValueArray, float64 Guess) cil managed
Public Function IRR (ByRef ValueArray As Double(), Optional Guess As Double = 0.1) As Double
static member IRR : * double -> double

param.name: ValueArray
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定现金流值的 数组。

span.span: Array of specifying cash flow values.

param.span: 该数组必须至少包含一个负值（支出）和一个正值（收入）。

span.span: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).

param.name: Guess
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定 将返回的估算值的对象。

span.span: Object specifying value you estimate will be returned by .

param.span: 如果省略，Guess 便为 0.1 (10%)。

span.span: If omitted, Guess is 0.1 (10 percent).

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它指定一系列定期现金流（支出和收入）的内部收益率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它指定一系列定期现金流（支出和收入）的内部收益率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部报酬率的是获得的投资组成付款和收款定期间隔执行的利率。The internal rate of return is the interest rate received for an investment consisting of payments and receipts that occur at regular intervals. `IRR`函数使用的值的数组中的顺序来解释的支出和收入的顺序。The `IRR` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 请确保输入正确的顺序的支出和收入值。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. 每个时期的现金流不需要以保持不变，因为它是年金。The cash flow for each period does not need to be fixed, as it is for an annuity. `IRR` 按迭代计算。`IRR` is calculated by iteration. 开头的值`Guess`，`IRR`进行计算，直到结果是精确到 0.00001%范围内的周期。Starting with the value of `Guess`, `IRR` cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate to within 0.00001 percent. 如果`IRR`找不到 20 后的结果会尝试，则它将失败。If `IRR` cannot find a result after 20 tries, it fails. ## Examples 在此示例中，`IRR`函数返回的数组中包含的五个现金流的内部收益率`Values()`。In this example, the `IRR` function returns the internal rate of return for a series of five cash flows contained in the array `Values()`. 第一个数组元素是表示业务启动成本负现金流。The first array element is a negative cash flow representing business start-up costs. 后续的 4 年之久，剩余的四个现金流表示正现金流。The remaining four cash flows represent positive cash flows for the subsequent four years. `Guess` 是估计的内部收益率。`Guess` is the estimated internal rate of return. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#20)]

span.span: Array argument values are invalid or <= -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public static double MIRR (ref double[] ValueArray, double FinanceRate, double ReinvestRate);
.method public static float64 MIRR(float64[]& ValueArray, float64 FinanceRate, float64 ReinvestRate) cil managed
Public Function MIRR (ByRef ValueArray As Double(), FinanceRate As Double, ReinvestRate As Double) As Double
public: static double MIRR(cli::array <double> ^ % ValueArray, double FinanceRate, double ReinvestRate);
static member MIRR : * double * double -> double

param.name: ValueArray
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定现金流值的 数组。

span.span: Array of specifying cash-flow values.

param.span: 该数组必须至少包含一个负值（支出）和一个正值（收入）。

span.span: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).

param.name: FinanceRate
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定作为财务成本支付的利率的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying interest rate paid as the cost of financing.

param.name: ReinvestRate
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定从现金再投资收益中所得利率的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying interest rate received on gains from cash reinvestment.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它指定一系列定期现金流（支出和收入）修改后的内部收益率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the modified internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它指定一系列定期现金流（支出和收入）修改后的内部收益率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the modified internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已修改的内部收益率是内部报酬率的支出和收入指时以不同速率。The modified internal rate of return is the internal rate of return when payments and receipts are financed at different rates. `MIRR`函数将考虑这两个方面的投资的成本 (`FinanceRate`) 和收到的现金再投资的利率 (`ReinvestRate`)。The `MIRR` function takes into account both the cost of the investment (`FinanceRate`) and the interest rate received on reinvestment of cash (`ReinvestRate`). `FinanceRate`和`ReinvestRatearguments`都表示为十进制值的百分比。The `FinanceRate` and `ReinvestRatearguments` are percentages expressed as decimal values. 例如，12%表示为 0.12。For example, 12 percent is expressed as 0.12. `MIRR`函数使用的值的数组中的顺序来解释的支出和收入的顺序。The `MIRR` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 请确保输入正确的顺序的支出和收入值。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. ## Examples 此示例使用`MIRR`函数返回一系列的现金流的数组中包含的已修改内部收益率`Values()`。This example uses the `MIRR` function to return the modified internal rate of return for a series of cash flows contained in the array `Values()`. `LoanAPR` 表示融资利率和`InvAPR`表示中得到的利率的利率。`LoanAPR` represents the financing interest, and `InvAPR` represents the interest rate received on reinvestment. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#29)]

span.span: Rank of does not equal 1, = -1, or = -1
Division by zero has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public static double NPer (double Rate, double Pmt, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);
.method public static float64 NPer(float64 Rate, float64 Pmt, float64 PV, float64 FV, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due) cil managed
Public Function NPer (Rate As Double, Pmt As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member NPer : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期利率的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的年利率 (APR) 为 10%，按月还款，则每期利率为 0.1/12（即 0.0083）。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期应付金额的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying payment to be made each period.

param.span: 付款金额通常包含本金和利息，该值在年金的有效期限内都不会改变。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that does not change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定未来一系列支出或收入现值的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，如果您贷款买车，贷款额就是您将以按月还款的方式付给贷方的现值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 数据类型，指定完成最后一次付款后所希望的终值或现金余额。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，贷款的终值为 $0，这是因为终值是末期还款之后的价值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 但是，如果您想用 18 年的时间存储 $50,000 作为孩子的教育经费，则 $50,000 是终值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 类型的对象指定付款何时到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 如果在付款期末付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.EndOfPeriod；如果在付款期初付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.BegOfPeriod。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金的期数。

span.span: Returns a specifying the number of periods for an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金的期数。

span.span: Returns a specifying the number of periods for an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是固定的现金支付一段时间内所做的一系列。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或投资 （如每月节省计划）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). （例如存款） 支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用`NPer`中包含函数返回在此期间所需的付款其值偿还贷款的期限数`PVal`。This example uses the `NPer` function to return the number of periods during which payments must be made to pay off a loan whose value is contained in `PVal`. 此外提供了每期利率百分比 (`APR / 12`)，付款 (`Payment`)，为贷款的终值 (`FVal`)，以及一个用于指示是否付款的开头或末尾的支付周期截止时间是数字 (`PayType`).Also provided are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment (`Payment`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

span.span: = 0 and = 0

MemberSignature.Value: public static double NPV (double Rate, ref double[] ValueArray);
.method public static float64 NPV(float64 Rate, float64[]& ValueArray) cil managed
Public Function NPV (Rate As Double, ByRef ValueArray As Double()) As Double
public: static double NPV(double Rate, cli::array <double> ^ % ValueArray);
static member NPV : double * -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期贴现率的 数据类型，以小数表示。

span.span: specifying discount rate over the length of the period, expressed as a decimal.

param.name: ValueArray
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定现金流值的 数组。

span.span: Array of specifying cash flow values.

param.span: 该数组必须至少包含一个负值（支出）和一个正值（收入）。

span.span: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于一系列定期现金流（支出和收入）和贴现率来指定投资的净现值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts) and a discount rate.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于一系列定期现金流（支出和收入）和贴现率来指定投资的净现值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts) and a discount rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 投资的净现值是未来的一系列支出和收入的当前值。The net present value of an investment is the current value of a future series of payments and receipts. `NPV`函数使用的值的数组中的顺序来解释的支出和收入的顺序。The `NPV` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 请确保输入正确的顺序的支出和收入值。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. `NPV`投资日期之前的第一个现金流值的一个周期开始和结束数组中的最后一个现金流值。The `NPV` investment begins one period before the date of the first cash flow value and ends with the last cash flow value in the array. Net 的现值计算基于未来的现金流。The net present value calculation is based on future cash flows. 如果你的第一个现金流发生在第一个期间开始，第一个值必须添加到返回的值`NPV`，并且必须不包含在的现金流值`ValueArray`。If your first cash flow occurs at the beginning of the first period, the first value must be added to the value returned by `NPV` and must not be included in the cash flow values of `ValueArray`. `NPV`函数是类似于`PV`函数 （现值），不同之处在于`PV`函数允许现金流开始，也可以在的末尾或句点开头。The `NPV` function is similar to the `PV` function (present value) except that the `PV` function allows cash flows to begin either at the end or the beginning of a period. 与不同的变量`NPV`现金流值`PV`现金流必须在整个投资固定。Unlike the variable `NPV` cash flow values, `PV` cash flows must be fixed throughout the investment. ## Examples 此示例使用`NPV`函数返回一系列的现金流的数组中包含的净现值`values()`。This example uses the `NPV` function to return the net present value for a series of cash flows contained in the array `values()`. 中存储的返回值`FixedRetRate`，表示固定的内部收益率。The return value, stored in `FixedRetRate`, represents the fixed internal rate of return. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

span.span: is , rank of <> 1, or = -1

MemberSignature.Value: public static double Pmt (double Rate, double NPer, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);

Public Function Pmt (Rate As Double, NPer As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member Pmt : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期利率的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的年利率 (APR) 为 10%，按月还款，则每期利率为 0.1/12（即 0.0083）。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金付款总期数的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的期限为四年，按月还款，则这笔贷款共有 4 \* 12（即 48）个支付周期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 × 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定在未来一系列要支付的付款现值（或一次付清款项）的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the present value (or lump sum) that a series of payments to be paid in the future is worth now.

param.span: 例如，如果您贷款买车，贷款额就是您将以按月还款的方式付给贷方的现值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 数据类型，指定完成最后一次付款后所希望的终值或现金余额。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，贷款的终值为 $0，这是因为终值是末期还款之后的价值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 但是，如果您想用 18 年的时间储蓄 $50,000 作为孩子的教育经费，则 $50,000 是终值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 during 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 类型的对象指定付款何时到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 如果在付款期末付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.EndOfPeriod；如果在付款期初付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.BegOfPeriod。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金的付款金额。

span.span: Returns a specifying the payment for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金的付款金额。

span.span: Returns a specifying the payment for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是固定的现金支付一段时间期间所做的一系列。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made during a period of time. 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或投资 （如每月节省计划）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用相同单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`按月计算，`NPer`还必须通过使用几个月计算。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 现金付费 （如存款） 表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。For all arguments, cash paid (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用`Pmt`函数以返回贷款固定的时间段内的每月付款。This example uses the `Pmt` function to return the monthly payment for a loan during a fixed period. 提供了每期利率百分比 (`APR / 12`)，付款的总数 (`TotPmts`)，现值或主体的贷款 (`PVal`)，为贷款的终值 (`FVal`)，和一个数字，指示是否付款的开头或末尾的支付周期截止时间是 `(PayType).`Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period `(PayType).` [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double PPmt (double Rate, double Per, double NPer, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期利率的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的年利率 (APR) 为 10%，按月还款，则每期利率为 0.1/12（即 0.0083）。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Per
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定从 1 到 NPer 范围内的支付周期。

span.span: specifies the payment period in the range 1 through NPer.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金付款总期数的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的期限为四年，按月还款，则这笔贷款共有 4 \* 12（即 48）个支付周期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定未来一系列支出或收入现值的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the current value of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，如果您贷款买车，贷款额就是您将以按月还款的方式付给贷方的现值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 数据类型，指定完成最后一次付款后所希望的终值或现金余额。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，贷款的终值为 $0，这是因为终值是末期还款之后的价值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 但是，如果您想用 18 年的时间存储 $50,000 作为孩子的教育经费，则 $50,000 是终值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 如果在付款期末付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.EndOfPeriod；如果在付款期初付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.BegOfPeriod。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金在给定期间的本金付款额。

span.span: Returns a specifying the principal payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金在给定期间的本金付款额。

span.span: Returns a specifying the principal payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是固定的现金支付一段时间内所做的一系列。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或投资 （如每月节省计划）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用相同单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`按月计算，`NPer`还必须通过使用几个月计算。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 现金付费 （如存款） 表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。For all arguments, cash paid (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用`PPmt`函数来计算时所有付款，都则相等值的多少特定期间的付款是主体。This example uses the `PPmt` function to calculate how much of a payment for a specific period is principal when all the payments are of equal value. 提供了每期利率百分比 (`APR / 12`)，为其所需的主体部分的支付周期 (`Period`)，付款的总数 (`TotPmts`)，现值或主体的贷款 (`PVal`)，则贷款的终值 (`FVal`)，以及一个用于指示是否付款的开头或末尾的支付周期截止时间是数字 (`PayType`)。Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment period for which the principal portion is desired (`Period`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#24)]

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于未来等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金的现值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the present value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments to be paid in the future and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它基于未来等额分期付款和固定利率指定年金的现值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the present value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments to be paid in the future and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是固定的现金支付一段时间内所做的一系列。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或投资 （如每月节省计划）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用相同单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`按月计算，`NPer`还必须通过使用几个月计算。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. （例如存款） 支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 在此示例中，`PV`函数返回将提供的下一步的 20 年每 50,000 年美元的 $1,000,000 年金的现值。In this example, the `PV` function returns the present value of an $1,000,000 annuity that will provide $50,000 a year for the next 20 years. 下面提供的是预期的年利率 (`APR`)，付款的总数 (`TotPmts`)，每个付款金额 (`YrIncome`)，所做的投资的总未来值 (`FVal`)，和一个数字，指示是否每个付款方式，则进行的开头或末尾付款期内的 (`PayType`)。Provided are the expected annual percentage rate (`APR`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of each payment (`YrIncome`), the total future value of the investment (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether each payment is made at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). 请注意，`YrIncome`是负数，因为它表示每年从年金中支付的现金。Note that `YrIncome` is a negative number because it represents cash paid out from the annuity each year. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double Rate (double NPer, double Pmt, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod, double Guess = 0.1);
.method public static float64 Rate(float64 NPer, float64 Pmt, float64 PV, float64 FV, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due, float64 Guess) cil managed

Public Function Rate (NPer As Double, Pmt As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod, Optional Guess As Double = 0.1) As Double
static member Rate : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate * double -> double
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.VisualBasic.Financial.Rate (NPer, Pmt, PV, FV, Due, Guess)

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金付款总期数的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽车贷款的期限为四年，按月还款，则这笔贷款共有 4 \* 12（即 48）个支付周期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 \* 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定每期应付金额的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the payment to be made each period.

param.span: 付款金额通常包含本金和利息，该值在年金的有效期限内都不会改变。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that doesn't change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定未来一系列支出或收入现值的 数据类型。

span.span: specifies the present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，如果您贷款买车，贷款额就是您将以按月还款的方式付给贷方的现值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 数据类型，指定完成最后一次付款后所希望的终值或现金余额。

span.span: specifies the future value or cash balance you want after you make the final payment.

param.span: 例如，贷款的终值为 $0，这是因为终值是末期还款之后的价值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 但是，如果您想用 18 年的时间存储 $50,000 作为孩子的教育经费，则 $50,000 是终值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 类型的对象指定付款何时到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 如果在付款期末付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.EndOfPeriod；如果在付款期初付款，则此参数必须为 DueDate.BegOfPeriod。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

param.name: Guess
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定 返回的估计值的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying value you estimate is returned by .

param.span: 如果省略，Guess 便为 0.1 (10%)。

span.span: If omitted, Guess is 0.1 (10 percent).

summary.span: 返回一个指定每期年金利率的 数据类型。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest rate per period for an annuity.

returns.span: 返回一个指定每期年金利率的 数据类型。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest rate per period for an annuity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是固定的现金支付一段时间内所做的一系列。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或投资 （如每月节省计划）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). （例如存款） 支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. `Rate` 按迭代计算。`Rate` is calculated by iteration. 开头的值`Guess`，`Rate`进行计算，直到结果是精确到 0.00001%范围内的周期。Starting with the value of `Guess`, `Rate` cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate to within 0.00001 percent. 如果`Rate`找不到 20 后的结果会尝试，则它将失败。If `Rate` cannot find a result after 20 tries, it fails. 如果该值为 10%并`Rate`失败，尝试不同的值为`Guess`。If your guess is 10 percent and `Rate` fails, try a different value for `Guess`. ## Examples 此示例使用`Rate`函数以计算给定的付款总数贷款利率 (`TotPmts`)，贷款付款金额 (`Payment`)，现值或主体的贷款 (`PVal`)，未来贷款的值 (`FVal`)，指示是否付款截止时间是在开头或末尾付款期内的数字 (`PayType`)，并预期利率的近似值 (`Guess`)。This example uses the `Rate` function to calculate the interest rate of a loan given the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of the loan payment (`Payment`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`), and an approximation of the expected interest rate (`Guess`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

public: static double SLN(double Cost, double Salvage, double Life);

param.name: Cost
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定资产原始成本的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Salvage
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定资产在使用年限结束时的价值的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying value of the asset at the end of its useful life.

param.name: Life
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定资产使用年限的 数据类型。

span.span: specifying length of the useful life of the asset.

summary.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它指定资产在一个周期内的直线折旧。

span.span: Returns a specifying the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period.

returns.span: 返回一个 数据类型，它指定资产在一个周期内的直线折旧。

span.span: Returns a specifying the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行此步骤期间必须以相同的单位`Life`参数。The depreciation period must be expressed in the same unit as the `Life` argument. 所有参数必须都是正数。All arguments must be positive numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用`SLN`函数以返回给定资产的初始成本一段时间内的直线折旧资产的 (`InitCost`)，资产的有用生命周期的结束处的残值 (`SalvageVal`)，和的总的生命周期年中的资产 (`LifeTime`)。This example uses the `SLN` function to return the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period given the asset's initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), and the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Life`和`Period`参数必须以相同的单位。The `Life` and `Period` arguments must be expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Life`给定的几个月，`Period`还必须在几个月提供。For example, if `Life` is given in months, `Period` must also be given in months. 所有参数必须都是正数。All arguments must be positive numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用`SYD`函数以返回给定资产的初始成本在指定期间内的资产折旧 (`InitCost`)，资产的有用生命周期的结束处的残值 (`SalvageVal`)，和中资产的总使用年限年 (`LifeTime`)。This example uses the `SYD` function to return the depreciation of an asset for a specified period given the asset's initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), and the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
